name: Spectron
description: Spectron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. Its sturdy box-shaped body and classic soldier design make it a formidable presence. With its arms and legs positioned in a confident hand-down stance, Spectron exudes strength and readiness. Although its screen is broken, it remains functional and continues to fulfill its duties with unwavering determination. To add an extra layer of protection, Spectron dons a resilient helmet. Despite its rugged appearance, Spectron possesses advanced intelligence and a keen eye for detail, making it an invaluable asset to the WebtrES club.
